conversion_verification.notes: The model represents a successful 3D cutaway transformation with clear geometric depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation. Walls have proper thickness and height; isometric perspective is well-maintained.

geometric_accuracy.notes: The garage was incorrectly converted into a primary bedroom, and the study was turned into a bathroom/laundry area. Most other room adjacencies are preserved.

interior_elements.notes: Frequent furniture placement; kitchen and bathroom fixtures are present, though some furniture logic (beds in garages) is flawed.

visual_clarity.notes: High rendering quality with soft lighting and clean material application. No UI contamination.

detected_errors.description: 2-Car Garage incorrectly rendered as a master-sized bedroom.
Study transformed into a bathroom/tiled utility space.

summary: An aesthetically high-quality 3D conversion that accurately follows the wall layout but misinterprets the functional purpose of the garage and study.
